channel.name: France 24 English FR
channel.title: France In Focus
channel.desc: France in Focus brings you the top stories and most essential reports from France. Be the first to know about latest events in French politics, culture, economy, and so much more.

channel.name: France 24 English FR
channel.title: News
channel.desc: Watch the latest international top stories every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences and analytics of key events.
